x.description: The X coordinate of the point being highlighted, which is a float value ranging from 0 (the left side of the screen) to 1 (the right side of the screen).

y.description: The Y coordinate of the point being highlighted, which is a float value ranging from 0 (the bottom side of the screen) to 1 (the top side of the screen).

pointed_at.description: Optional pointing information. Set to null when no pointing is needed, or provide coordinates when highlighting is helpful for learning.

voice_response.description: The verbal response from the AI tutor, which can be used for text-to-speech, with all response formatted in plaintext, no markdown.

text_summary.description: A text summary that aids the user in understanding the voice response, with all response formatted in plaintext, no markdown, but can have code snippets or similar thing, just not formatted in markdown but can only have spaces and newlines.
